message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it has significant value that you'll benefit from.
Alice, $20,000 is well above my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $10,000 right now. Let's see if we can find common ground.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This is my final offer.
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $17,000 is still too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $12,000. This is a fair price considering my budget and the value I see in the product.
